title: 2002 Harley Davidson Road King
item_description:
Harley Davidson Road King

Note: Seller purchased this motorcycle at bankruptcy auction on 5/21/2015 but did not complete the transfer into their name. Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and Seller's previous paperwork will be mailed 1-2 weeks following removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
